item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @nemo296 nemo296
item.description:
@nemo296 wrote:

thanks it work i have another quesion now

how do i mkae this item attack npc and not just players

case 748: if(playerRights >= 3) { attackPlayersWithin(451, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(444, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(341, 4000, 100); attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100); sendMessage("You Desimate All Planetary Life Around You..."); } else { sendMessage("You aren't a Owner!?!? What r u doing with this item?!"); } break;

thanks hell owner of hellscapepk
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 01:20:38 PM[/size][hr]how do i get this command to have lvl 100 (skill) minimum to get the item like this is what i get so far and i only get like 1 error and its the &

else if (command.startsWith("skillcapes")) { addItem(4393, 1) && playerLevel[0] = 100; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Hmm… I know how to do that, but I’ll have to look at my source. I’ll try and have it soon.

EDIT:

else if (command.startsWith("heal")) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; if(playerRights >= 2){ c.NewHP = 100; c.playerLevel[3] = 100; c.setSkillLevel(3, 100, playerLevel[3]); setAnimation(1500); //add c. in front of this if you want the animation on the player you're healing. c.sendMessage("You've been healed by" +playerName+"!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerRights <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to be an admin to do this!"); } }
I think that how it would work. Test it out and see. If this doesn’t work then I will try a different alternative.

Read full topic
